item.title: Create a Personal Website for Free
item.description: So, you have finally decided that you want to put your thoughts out there on the web. You fire up your favorite search engine and take a quick look around on how to do so and are bogged down by the number of options available. Some of those options provide you ready made websites with awesome bells and whistles, but charge you copious amount of money. Others are more easy on your pocket but require skills that only a computer engineer possesses.
